p: RT-PCR was performed to evaluate the expression of the pluripotency genes ( OCT4, NANOG, DNMT3B, TERT, REX1, and SOX2); the differentiation genes of the three germ layers ( TUBB, PAX6 (ectoderm), PECAM, CDH5, GATA2, FLK1 (mesoderm), AFP, GATA4 (endoderm)); the neural stem cell-specific genes NESTIN, PAX6, SOX1, SOX2 and the neuron-specific genes TUBB, MAP-2, NSE.
